title: Settings
description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
change_password.alert: Make sure it's at least 8 characters long and includes a mix of letters, numbers, and a symbols or special characters.

tab.title: Appearance
tab.description: Customize the appearance of your account.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language that you are most comfortable with to enhance your user experience.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Select the theme for the interface.

motion.title: Motion & Animation
motion.description: Enable or disable interface animations for a more comfortable experience.

choice.title: On-Off
choice.description: Turning off motion can help reduce distractions or discomfort for sensitive users.

timeFormat.title: Time Format
timeFormat.description: Choose how time is displayed throughout the application.
